author: jfernan2
body:
#### PR description:

Following discussions in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43432  we (RECO) would like to move from RECO output to AOD output in Run3 Data RelVal Workflows. 

From the reco side, we would like to profile a workflow which more closely resembles what is done in prompt reco or in a reprocessing campaign. One imagines that moving the majority of relval workflows to AOD would be beneficial to disk load of release validation (a factor in reduction from RECO to AOD).

As the primary responsible of these workflows, we brought this up with @cms-sw/pdmv-l2
They tend to agree that it doesn't make sense to have all real data wfs write RECO (it's not the case for MC), but suggested we bring the issue to a wider audience

#### PR validation:

Tested that RelVal workflows affected run fine and produce AOD output
title: [RFC] Change output from RECO to AOD in Run3 Data RelVal wfs
